mapper.select: SELECT A.iuser, A.email, A.nm, A.tel, A.mainProfile , (SELECT COUNT(iuser) FROM t_movie_fav WHERE iuser = ${youIuser}) AS postercnt , (SELECT COUNT(from_iuser) FROM t_user_follow WHERE from_iuser = #{youIuser}) AS cntFollow , (SELECT COUNT(to_iuser) FROM t_user_follow WHERE to_iuser = #{youIuser}) AS cntFollower , (SELECT COUNT(from_iuser) FROM t_user_follow WHERE from_iuser = #{youIuser} AND to_iuser = #{meIuser}) AS isYouFollowMe , (SELECT COUNT(from_iuser) FROM t_user_follow WHERE from_iuser = #{meIuser} AND to_iuser = #{youIuser}) AS isMeFollowYou FROM t_user A WHERE A.iuser = ${youIuser}
